parameter.name: rfc2307_group_fallback_map
parameter.description: Specify whether to map group IDs (GIDs) based on the object name or object UUID when no .B gidNumber attribute is found in an on-prem Active Directory instance synchronized to Azure Entra ID. This option is only applicable if .B id_attr_map is set to .B rfc2307. If .B id_attr_map = rfc2307 and a group does not have a .B gidNumber defined in the directory, this setting determines the fallback method for mapping the group ID. If this option is not set, groups without a .B gidNumber will not be available to NSS.
